LanguageData.MaxHitPoints.label: maks. helbredspoint
LanguageData.MaxHitPoints.description: Det højeste antal helbredspoint af en genstand. Det er hvor meget skade genstanden kan modtage før den går itu.
LanguageData.Mass.label: masse
LanguageData.Mass.description: Den fysiske masse af en genstand.
LanguageData.MarketValue.label: markedsværdi
LanguageData.MarketValue.description: Markedsværdien af et objekt. Den aktuelle handelspris vil blive påvirket af forholdsstatus og forhandlings evner, og andre kontekstuelle faktorer.
LanguageData.SellPriceFactor.label: sell price multiplier
LanguageData.SellPriceFactor.description: A multiplier on the price at which you can sell items.
LanguageData.Flammability.label: flammability
LanguageData.Flammability.description: How easily an object catches fire and how strongly it burns.
LanguageData.WorkToMake.label: work to make
LanguageData.WorkToMake.description: The base amount of work it takes to make this, once all materials and tools are gathered.
LanguageData.WorkToBuild.label: work to build
LanguageData.WorkToBuild.description: The base amount of work it takes to build a structure, once all materials and tools are gathered.
LanguageData.DeteriorationRate.label: deterioration rate
LanguageData.DeteriorationRate.description: The rate at which this item deteriorates when left outside, especially in the rain.
LanguageData.Beauty.label: beauty
LanguageData.Beauty.description: How enjoyable an object is to be around and look at.
LanguageData.Cleanliness.label: cleanliness
LanguageData.Comfort.label: comfort
LanguageData.Comfort.description: How comfortable an object is to sit or lay on.
